q: Is this action codeblock 1) a step towards resolving the problems identified in the orientation block 2) simple 3) with appropriate tool use?
description: An action block that defines a function 'go_down' to explore the initial dungeon level in Nethack. The function uses the 'nethack' tool to send the key 'j' to move down a step and then pauses for 1 second. The action is added to the weave-agent with the title 'Initial dungeon exploration' and referencing the function name go_down.
